Description: Body and foot of a cylindrical pottery lekythos ('Samian lekythos'); neck missing; coarse light red ware with dark sandy inclusions. Poor reddish slip, burnished.
Curator's comments: Lekythos of 'Samian' type; compare parallel dated to the end of the 7th to the first quarter of the 6th century BC (Stampolidis 2003, 295, no.263, National Archaeological Museum of Reggio Calabria inv. no. 119618)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.382)
